name: IBM MQ MFT Agent is not started or unreachable
description: Check the IBM MQ MFT agent status.

fields.name: content
fields.value:
1. Check if the IBM MQ MFT agent is running by using the command `netstat -an | grep mqm`. If the agent is not running, start it by running the command `mqm`.

 2. Verify that the IBM MQ MFT agent is listening on the correct port (1434) by checking the value of the `PORT` environment variable in the agent's configuration file (`/var/mqm/mft/mft.ini`).

 3. Ensure that the user running the IBM MFT agent has the necessary permissions to access the queue manager and its associated objects.

 4. Check the IBM MFT agent logs for any error messages or warnings that may provide more information about the cause of the issue.

 5. If the problem persists, consider restarting the IBM MQ MFT agent or the entire IBM MQ infrastructure.

If you are still experiencing issues with the IBM MQ MFT agent, you may want to consult the IBM Support team for further assistance.
